Description: Concave lip and wall sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery kylix (Type C); lip sharply offset in and out, slightly thickened at rim; wholly glazed; inscription lightly cut on exterior (small letters, seemingly modern).
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 22.2.18)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1497)
